Zero
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Library: Fan Fiction, Poetry, Birthday List, Links & Non-Fiction Archive: Poetry: Zero
By Wild Garuda on Monday, March 11, 2002 - 10:35 pm:

I had a monster,his name was Zero,
This is how he became a big hero.
He won many battles, yes he did,
He even beat my best friend Sid.
He got to level B, then A, then S,
Once again, he beat a guy, with a monster named Wes.
Well, he did real good,but he died, just like that,
He didn't leave anything, not nothing, not even a hat.
Well, that is the story of my monster named Zero,
that somehow, miraculously, became one big hero.
